Hi, I’m Tsong Khapa.

在这里您可以找到我的 帖子, 项目, 和 简历.

我从事金融行业, 服务泰康人寿的银行保险事业部. I work at Mapbox building tools to make stronger and faster maps. Previously I was a Code for America Fellow working on health care delivery in Richmond, VA.

I’m a former Editor for the Atlas of Design and proud member of CUGOS where we build cool map projects like Dropchop.

You can find most of my work on Github. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
